name: Exile One
description: '''Exile One''' is a [[kadans|cadence]] musical group founded by Gordon Henderson in the 1970s with musicians invited over from [[Dominica]], to be based in [[Guadeloupe]]. The band was influential in the development of [[Caribbean music]]. It became famous throughout the Caribbean, Europe, Africa and the Indian Ocean. Exile One opened the way for numerous Cadence-Lypso artists as well as for Zouk.
